title: Pizza on ciabatta bread
ingredients: ['1 ciabatta bread, cut in half lengthways', '2 tomatoes, chopped', '100g grated cheese', '12 to15 slices salami', '2 pickled chilli peppers, chopped', 'freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '1/4 teaspoon oregano', 'For the garlic dip', '3 tablespoons mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons plain yoghurt', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '3 sprigs chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
